bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Tebt. I, 152 descr., fr. 2, col. 1
Crawford Dorothy J., Kerkeosiris. An Egyptian Village in the Ptolemaic Period. (Cambridge Classical Studies.)
Cambridge, University Press, 1971, 8°, xv-238 pp., 1 carte, 1 front. et 3 pll.
Voir pp. 141-143 et pl. 3: édition de P. Tebt. I, 152 descr., fr. 2, col. 1.

C.R. par Bernard Boyaval, REA 75 (1973) pp. 403-405. - Robert Cavenaile, RBPhil 51 (1973) p. 1012. - Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 56 (1976) pp. 321-322. - J. Gwyn Griffiths, CR N.S., 24 (1974) pp. 249-251. - Michel Malaise, Latomus 32 (1973) pp. 681-682. - C. Wade Meade, JARCE 9 (1971-1972) pp. 156-157. - Ernst Meyer, MusHelv 29 (1972) pp. 298-299. - H. W. Pleket, BASP 9 (1972) pp. 45-48. - Tony Reekmans, ChrEg 46 (1971) No. 92, pp. 384-389. - Jacques Schwartz, REG 85 (1972) pp. 222-223. - Anna Swiderek, JJurP 18 (1974) pp. 298-302. - Fritz Uebel, BJb 173 (1973) pp. 533-539. - Elisabeth Waszink, BABesch 48 (1973) pp. 223-224.
